Subject: [newbie] building NEAT
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=218483856
X-Yahoo-Profile: dinhquangninh


Hello all,

I'm a student in University Pierre and Marie Curie, Paris, France, and
I'm very interested in NEAT. And I would like to thank your great work. 

I've read the artical "EVOLVING NEURAL NETWORKS THROUGH AUGMENTING
TOPOLOGIES", and I want to build the NEAT to have an experiment, then
to look into the code. In fact, I want to use NEAT in my study project
at school.

I've downloaded NEAT at
http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/nn/downloads/software/neat.1.1.tar.gz
and also neat.1.1-gcc.3.2.tar.gz in the files entry of yahoo groups.
But I have not sucessfully built both of them. I've been looking for
around to getting a tips in archive messages, but not sucessed.

I'm using a Fedora Core 3 box at home. Here is the out put erros when
I'm trying to build neat.1.1-gcc.3.2


----------------------
[root@linux finaldir]# make

I would like to appreciate any suggestion and tip. Please forgive my
terrible English because it is not my mother tongue (neither not French).
